game_description: Vetrix is a puzzle game inspired by Tetris, but with its own original mechanics built for virtual reality. Immerse yourself in an 8-bit VR world and show dexterity, speed, and organization to achieve the best possible score. > Place the shapes wherever you want You can place shapes on the bottom, the sides, or even the top of the puzzle area. There's no gravity so make good use of the space. > Special blocks Special blocks will give you bonuses, make sure you collect them swiftly. > Three game modes Score mode - Reach the highest score possible in 300 seconds. Time mode - Reach the target score as fast as possible. Free mode â€“ No time constraints, just relax. > Eight Color Palettes To better suit your mood. > Online Leaderboards So your friends know who's the best!
Languages: English, Chinese (China), French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Spanish (Spain)
review_2: I bought this game a while back because I was looking for a tetris like game but more immersive and more VR-ish, then I came across this game and it exceeded my expetations and wishes! The controls are super intuitive, which I love. You can make your playfield just as you wish, so if you want your blocks on your right you can do that, which makes playing much easier. The music is very retro and together with the looks of the game that gives a great asthetic. This game is my go to when I want to sit down and play for a while or when I want to go to sleep but just play a short nice game. Definitely recommend! This is a steal for just 5 bucks. The dev said there is a vetrix 2 coming so i'm looking forward to that. Thanks dev!
